item.title: Crowns
item.dc:creator: @daved daved
item.description:
@daved wrote:

How do I change the Crown of the moderator? I already have it in cache>Sprites>Mod

I don’t know what I need to change though and where.

I found this in client.java but i can’t get a thing from what it is saying.

/* mod icons custom */ aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1Array1099[2] = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1("modicon1"); aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1Array1099[3] = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1("modicon2"); aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1Array1099[14] = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1("customicon1"); aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1Array1099[17] = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1("iconh33"); aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1Array1099[16] = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1("bluurricon1");

I also have a sprites folder on it’s own… Do i have to copy the mod crown in the sprites folder? I want to know where is the file that contains the directory of the crowns.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2009, 02:02:26 pm[/size][hr]Found the problem… Fixed!

Read full topic
